item.title: Firstpost
item.description:
Lab 3 Blog Post üéÉ

About me :)

Hello!, I am a student at APU pursuing a degree in Bsc in Information Sciences. I like playing the guitar and volleyball, I like non fictiion books.
I have 2 small dogs back home, Namely Oreo and Frosty. Oreo is a Shih-Tzu and Frosty is a Maltese. I am currenly aiming to get a job after college üôè.
